summary: The sun drenched days of summer turn dark and ominous for hitchhiking duo Jack and Véronique when they become inexplicably entangled with a mysterious married couple and a local road kill collector in rural France.
cast: Andrew Simpson|Joséphine de La Baume|Frédéric Pierrot|Barbara Crampton|Féodor Atkine|Pierre Boulanger|Clémentine Alexandre|Erwan Hiernard|Susanna Cappellaro|Lucie Belhomme|April Kelley|Edward Hogg
keywords: hitchhiking|female frontal nudity|skinny dipping|nude swimming|sex scene
title: Road Games
